script:
1). How should we pay for the shipment?
Use the company credit card. 
We shouldn't have paid for it.
Yes, we should.
2). How often do we change the printer ink?
Open the top of the printer.
At 3 o'clock
Twice a month 
3). Drinks are on me!
Sorry you spilled.
Thanks, I'll get them next time. 
Not at all.
